table.Name: wcms_Page
table.Title: dm_page_title

field.Name: Page_Type
field.Title: f_page_type
field.Property: SqlSP='SP_A_R_001_Tree_Definition' ParentID='1000' Active='true' Default='1213' EnableHeader='false' Format='{1}' DisplayNoSelectText='false'

field.Name: Page_DefaultTheme
field.Title: f_theme_default
field.Property: SqlSP='SP_A_R_001_GetThemesList' ParentID='3300' Active='true' EnableHeader='false' ShowLock='true' Format='{1}'

field.Name: Page_Permission
field.Property: SqlSP='SP_A_R_001_Tree_Group' ParentID='100' Active='true' EnableHeader='false' ShowLock='true' Format='{1}' Seperator=';'

table.SQL_SELECT_LIST: set nocount on declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int, @parentID int declare @gid int = {@GID} Select @parentID = Page_ID from wcms_Page where Page_Type = 1221 AND Page_SiteID = @siteID AND Page_LanguageID = @langID set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from WCMS_Page where Page_SiteID = @siteID AND Page_LanguageID = @langID AND Page_Level > 1 AND Page_ID <> @parentID AND Page_ParentID <> @parentID { AND Page_ID @Search:Page_ID } { AND Page_Title @Search:Page_Title } AND (@gid <>25 OR (@gid = 25 AND Page_ID in (922,938,1372,963,987))) ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 15 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage select [Page_ID] ,[Page_Title] ,case when [Page_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Page_A] ,[PageProperty] ,[PageUrl] ,Page_Type ,(case when CountPage > 0 then 0 else { @IsMod } end) as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Page_ID] ,'' + REPLICATE('|—', Page_Level - 2) + ' ' + (case Page_Level when 2 then '' + [Page_Title] + '' when 3 then '' + [Page_Title] + '' else [Page_Title] end) as [Page_Title] ,[Page_Level] ,(case when [Page_Mark] is null OR [Page_Mark] = '' then '' else '*' end) + (case when [Page_IsHomePage] = 1 then 'H' else '' end) + (case [Page_Type] when 1214 then 'L' when 1219 then '-' else '' end) + (case when [Page_SSL] = 1 then 'S' else '' end) + (case when [Page_EnabledRSS] = 1 then 'R' else '' end) + (case when [Page_AdvSearchList] = 1 then 'S' else '' end) as [PageProperty] ,Page_Type ,[Page_A] ,(select count(0) from wcms_PageMod where PageMod_PageID = [Page_ID] { AND PageMod_AccountID = @ModID }) as [CountPage] ,(case when Page_Type <> 1214 AND Page_Type <> 1219 then '' else '' end) as [PageUrl] from WCMS_Page where Page_SiteID = @siteID AND Page_LanguageID = @langID AND Page_Level > 1 AND Page_ID <> @parentID AND Page_ParentID <> @parentID { AND Page_ID @Search:Page_ID } { AND Page_Title @Search:Page_Title } AND (@gid <>25 OR (@gid = 25 AND Page_ID in (922,938,1372,963,987))) ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT:
set nocount on declare @mod nvarchar(max) set @mod = ''
select @mod = @mod + ';' + convert(nvarchar(10), PageMod_AccountID) from wcms_PageMod where PageMod_PageID = @editID if (@mod <> '') set @mod = substring(@mod, 2, len(@mod) - 1)
select [Page_ID] ,[Page_ParentID] ,[Page_Title] ,[Page_TitleAlias] ,[Page_IsHomepage] ,[Page_UrlLink] ,[Page_MetaTitle] ,[Page_MetaKeywords] ,[Page_MetaDescription] ,[Page_DefaultTheme] ,[Page_CssClass] ,[Page_O] ,[Page_A] ,[Page_EnabledComment] ,[Page_SSL] ,[Page_EnabledRSS] ,[Page_Permission] ,[Page_Email] ,[Page_Ext1] ,[Page_Ext2] ,@mod as [PageMod]
,[Page_Type] ,[Page_Layout] ,'' as [Page_UC] ,[Page_UC] as [Module] ,[Page_ID] as [PageID] ,'' as [Page_TitleUrl] ,[Page_MediaLink] ,[Page_Mark] ,[Page_AdvSearchList] ,[Page_Background]
,Page_FixCoverBkg from WCMS_Page where Page_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE:
declare @id int set @id = @editID
update wcms_Page set [Page_A]= @active where Page_ID = @id select @id
table.SQL_DELETE:
set nocount on declare @id int set @id = @delID
delete wcms_PageAdvertisement where PageAdvertisement_PageID = @id delete wcms_PageBanner where PageBanner_PageID = @id delete wcms_PageMod where PageMod_PageID = @id delete wcms_PagePoll where PagePoll_PageID = @id delete wcms_PagePost where PagePost_PageID = @id delete wcms_PageProduct where PageProduct_PageID = @id
set nocount off
delete wcms_Page where Page_ID = @id select @@ROWCOUNT exec [SP_A_W_001_UpdatePageHierarchySort]
if (@logAcc > 0) Insert into wcms_Log(Log_DateTime, Log_Action, Log_Do, Log_Table, Log_ItemID, Log_AccountID) values(getutcdate(), 'log_page_delete', '(' + @logIP + ') Deleted 1 page.', 'Page', @id, @logAcc)
